summary: A girl who had left her home village for life in Tokyo returns to her home years later, and evokes a scandal when the locals discover that she's a stripper.
cast: Hideko Takamine|Shûji Sano|Chishû Ryû|Kuniko Igawa|Takeshi Sakamoto|Bontarô Miake|Keiji Sada|Toshiko Kobayashi|Kôji Mitsui|Yûko Mochizuki|Yoshindo Yamaji|Akio Isono|Kokuten Kôdô|Sumie Kuwabara|Eiko Takamatsu|Shôichi Kofujita|Shusuke Agata|Kiyoshi Koike|Isao Shirosawa|Yôichi Ohsugi|Susumu Takase|Jun Tanizaki|Akira Noto|Jun Yokoyama|Shunsuke Kaneko|Tami Yamamoto|Haruko Chichibu|Eitarô Ozawa
title: Carmen vuelve a casa
